/** ------------------------------------------------------------------------ File : StandardScopeEnum Purpose : Enumeration of InjectABL scopes. This is the standard/default set. Syntax : Description : @author pjudge Created : Fri Jun 04 13:50:10 EDT 2010 Notes : ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */

property.name: Transient
property.propertyComment: /** One instance, running free, like a wolf. */

property.name: Singleton
property.propertyComment: /** Only one instance at a time: effectively scoped to the life of the InjectABL kernel. */

property.name: AgentConnection
property.propertyComment: /** One instance per connection; meaningless for statefree Appservers */
